entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued October 30 at 2:47PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...PATCHY FREEZING RAIN POSSIBLE... A weather front will bring precipitation to the West Coast and Western Interior into Tuesday. Precipitation type will vary by location, with warmer areas near the coast more likely to see rain. Sheltered inland areas that stay below freezing will see some light freezing rain at times.
